title: Abu-Naim
author: Abu-Naim
content: Hello my people, I hope una they fine,I get on question wey I been they try ask here.As here na we Nigerians they this board e get place for here wey I fit buy BTC directly from my fellow Nigerians wey they here?I ask this question because I wan buy BTC for investment with my small 50,000 Naira, so I said make I come here ask if una get place wey I go take buy the BTC direct without having any problem.I they try avoid KYC from exchanges like Binance na why I ask for hear, if there is any link to the thread wey we go fit the exchange our Naira to BTC withing us here in this board abeg make una share with me because to buy from people wey you no trust fit bring problem such as scam by running with my money.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: You are on the right board.CryptopreneurBrainboss was offering this service before, I do not know if he is going to be interested or not. His exchange service thread has been locked. I am just seeing this right now.Igehhbotz too make some offers in the past, but I do not know if he is going to be interested.I hope there will be some people that will accept this offer.I would have helped but I do not prepare for this. I am surprised that Brainbiss has locked his exchange thread.Be careful of scammers. If you are using anyone that is not reputed enough, use someone in between as an escrow.

comments.author: Sim_card
comments.body: Contact Brainboss through PM and hear what he will say because I believe that he was running this service then not until now that @Charles-Tim is saying that his exchange has been blocked. So you haveÂ  to confirm from him directly to hear from him. It is better to deal with trusted people than those you don't know. Some members here might also be interested to sell but if only you know who they are,you would have contacted them too.

comments.body: Quote from: Charles-Tim on August 17, 2023, 01:10:59 PMYou are on the right board.Igehhbotz too make some offers in the past, but I do not know if he is going to be interested.I hope there will be some people that will accept this offer.I would have helped but I do not prepare for this. I am surprised that Brainbiss has locked his exchange thread.Be careful of scammers. If you are using anyone that is not reputed enough, use someone in between as an escrow.Yes I'm open to trade. I'm surprised why the OP wouldn't use a CEX P2P, which is one of the most efficient ways to buy and sell cryptocurrency in Nigeria. I understand that most individuals dislike the idea of KYC, but I see nothing wrong with submitting a tie 1 KYC, which is to verify email and phone number only and trading less than $100 each day. Op if you must buy from anyone from this board I'm ready to serve as zero-fees escrow for the deal.But if you want to get it from me send a PM and I will give you my rates.

And since the op is asking the local board to purchase bitcoin, it is better he uses p2p for that and if anyone here junsi go collect wotowo with red feedback enough ones for dat matter. Op since Igebotz has accepted the order then you don't have anything to worry about it again. Just dm and start the process. Good luck with good deal.

It is an offer that he accepted, or look for other people with a better rate if you think his rate is expensive for you is what he is talking about.

comments.body: Op f you know anyone in your locality who is also a bitcoiner and if he has bitcoin ask him to sell some for you. And that is the p2p aspect of bitcoin but since someone has volunteered to sell for you then you have to dm im and have the deal. He is a reliable fellow in the forum. And please if you are dealing with newbies in the forum or the local board, please take precautions because many of those guys are just coming na to make money so anyhow if you fall for their hands you will your own and nobody in this local board can help that. It was Brainboss that was doing that service and probably because of the low patronage he stop at the moment but I believe he will still resume work very soon.
